Package co.cookies.sdk.storefront.v1

Class StorefrontClientV1

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cookies.sdk.storefront.v1.StorefrontClientV1
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Storefront
    @Immutable
@ThreadSafe
public final class StorefrontClientV1
extends java.lang.Object
implements Storefront
    Combined client facade implementing the Cookies Storefront API, version 1, which provides access to digital commerce features for the Cookies Platform, in cooperation with close partners.

    The Storefront API is a private API service enabling Cookies and close partners to transact online with consumers and businesses. Access to this API requires an bearer token (referred to as an API key) issued by Tech@Cookies, and for most methods, an authorized user access token.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  StorefrontClientV1.MenuClientV1
      API client implementing access to the Storefront Menu Service, version 1; the menu service is responsible for rendering final-goods data into abstract product-level menus in different contexts, and is typically consumed by storefront UI implementations.
      static class  StorefrontClientV1.ProfileClientV1
      API client implementing access to the Storefront Profile Service, version 1; the profile service is responsible for fetching and updating user profiles, usernames, avatars, and so forth and is typically consumed by storefront UI implementations.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface co.cookies.sdk.storefront.Storefront

        Storefront.CheckoutClient, Storefront.MenuClient, Storefront.ProfileClient, Storefront.StorefrontClient

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Storefront.MenuClient menu​(java.util.Optional<SDKConfiguration> configuration)
      Acquire an instance of the Storefront Menu API client, configured with the provided SDK configuration, overriding any active SDK configuration provided to the facade.
      Storefront.ProfileClient profile​(java.util.Optional<SDKConfiguration> configuration)
      Acquire an instance of the Storefront Profile API client, configured with the provided SDK configuration, overriding any active SDK configuration provided to the facade.
      static StorefrontClientV1 withServices​(StorefrontClientV1.MenuClientV1 menuClient, StorefrontClientV1.ProfileClientV1 profileClient)
      Acquire an instance of the main Storefront service facade, using the provided clients as constituent services to be handed back to the developer when requested.

public static StorefrontClientV1 withServices​(@Nonnull

        Acquire an instance of the main Storefront service facade, using the provided clients as constituent services to be handed back to the developer when requested.

        profileClient - Profile client instance to use.

      • menu

        @Nonnull
public Storefront.MenuClient menu​(@Nonnull
                                  java.util.Optional<SDKConfiguration> configuration)
        Description copied from interface: Storefront
        Acquire an instance of the Storefront Menu API client, configured with the provided SDK configuration, overriding any active SDK configuration provided to the facade.

        Optionally, this method's partner can be used to leverage the default SDK configuration attached to the facade which hosts the resulting instance.

        Specified by:
        menu in interface Storefront
        Returns:

        See Also:
